creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
dimension: 14 × 9 3/4 in. (35.56 × 24.7 cm) (image, sheet, vertical ōban, each)
inscription: left: 治郎ノ君 [3]岩井粂三郎 かしづき杉生 [1]吾妻市之丞; right: 別室藤ノ方 [2]尾上菊次郎 山名宗全 [1]片岡市蔵
markings: censor seals: 米良 {Mera} | 渡邊 {Watanabe} | publisher's seal: {Yama-hei} | シタ賣
medium: Woodblock prints (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
signed: 香蝶楼豊國画 {Kōchōrō Toyokuni ga}
text: Related to the play Higashiyama sakura zōshi 東山桜荘子, performed at the Nakamura Theater in the 8th month of 1851.
title: Actors Onoe Kikujirō II as Fuji no Kata, Nakayama Ichizō I as Yamana Sōzen (R), and Iwai Kumesaburō III as Jirō Kaja and Azuma Ichinojō I as Sugibae (L)
